tokens.text: checks if there is an item in the requested hand slot

generated_doNotEdit.title: Is Item Equipped
generated_doNotEdit.description: Takes one optional hand slot as a parameter (0 or 'main_hand' for main hand, 1 or 'off_hand' for off hand), and returns 1.0 if there is an item in the requested slot (defaulting to the main hand if no parameter is supplied), otherwise returns 0.0.
